-> This is identical to the trigger you get when you create a new one.
-> It triggers after typing `[[` and simply lists all tiddlers matching your query, without any additional filtering or changing how the results display.
-> Note that `$caret$` in Template is redundant as the caret will automatically be placed at the end of the inserted text if the caret token is not present

|!Setting |!Value |!Colour | |! Theme Color:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="theme-color" class="colour-edit" default="#195178"/>
Theme's main foreground color.
Default setting: #195178| <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="theme-color" type="color" default="#195178"/> | |! Theme Opposite Color:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="theme-opposite-color" default="#398ABC"/>
Enter theme's opposite color.
Default settings: #398ABC|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="theme-opposite-color" type="color" default="#398ABC"/>| |! Secondary Theme Color:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="theme-color2" default="#195178"/>
Theme's secondary foreground color. Used on tiddler titles and tags.
Default setting: #195178|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="theme-color2" type="color" default="#195178"/>| |! E-Book Theme Color:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="book-theme-color" default="#71382a"/>
Enter color for blockquotes and dropcaps.
Default setting: #71382a|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="book-theme-color" type="color" default="#71382a"/>| |! Sidebar Background Color:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="sidebar-background-color" default="#113955"/>
Enter the background color of the sidebar.
Default setting: #113955|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="sidebar-background-color" type="color" default="#113955"/>| |! Sidebar Selected Tab Background Color:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="sidebar-selected-tab-background-color" default="#113955"/>
Enter color for the background TABs in the sidebar that are selected.
Default setting: #113955|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="sidebar-selected-tab-background-color" type="color" default="#113955"/>| |! Sidebar Unselected Tab Background Color:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="sidebar-unselected-tab-background-color" default="#0c2a41"/>
Enter color for the background TABs in the sidebar that are not selected.
Default setting: #0c2a41|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="sidebar-unselected-tab-background-color" type="color" default="#0c2a41"/>|

.tmap-download-canvas { display: none }


.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-plugin-info .tc-plugin-info-chunk h1 {
   color: <>; !important;
}

pre {
  overflow: hidden !important;
}

.tc-edit {
  text-justify: none !important;
}

label {
  text-justify: none !important;
}

hr { background-color: <;  !important;  }

h1.tc-site-title {
  text-align: left !important;
}

.tc-block-dropdown a:hover { background-color: <>
  !important;  }


.tc-tags-wrapper:empty {
   border-bottom-color: <>;  !important;
}

.tc-site-title, .tc-site-title a.tc-tiddlylink {
  color: <> !important;
}


button.tc-tag-label, span.tc-tag-label, .tc-tab-content button.tc-tag-label.tc-untagged-label {
   background-color: <> !important;
}

.tc-page-container-wrapper {
    max-width: 100vw;
    overflow:  hidden !important;
    overflow-x: hidden !important;
    overflow-y:  hidden !important;
}

.tc-page-container-wrapper > * {
    max-width: 100vw;
    overflow: hidden !important;
}

.tc-sidebar-scrollable {
   top:0 !important;
   background-color: <> !important;
}


.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-content.tc-vertical {
   border-color: <> !important;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-content {
  background-color: <> !important;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button {
   background-color: <> !important;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button   {
   background-color: <>  !important;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
   background-color: <> !important;
   border-bottom-color: <> !important;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button.tc-tab-selected {
   background-color: <> !important;
   border-right-color: <> !important;
   border-bottom-color: <> !important;
}



.tc-tab-divider {
   background-color: <> !important;
}


.tc-system-title-prefix, .tc-tiddler-title-icon svg {
    fill: <>
 !important;
}


.tc-menu-list-subitem {
   background-color: <> !important;
}

.tc-tab-content .tc-sidebar-tabs-main {
   background-color: <> !important;
}

.tc-tab-set .tc-sidebar-tabs-main {
   background-color: <> !important;
}



.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-content p {
  text-align: left !important;
}

.tc-tiddlylink { 
  text-align: left !important;
}

/* Set height of top bar (this was 3rem) */
.tc-topbar  { 
   max-height: 2.0rem !important; 
   border-radius: 10px  !important;

   background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245) !important;
   top: 10px !important;
   width: auto !important;
   padding-left: 20px !important;
   padding-right: 20px !important;
   right: 20px !important;
   left: auto !important; 
}
.tc-topbar .tc-page-controls {
   margin-bottom: 0.4rem !important;
}

.tc-menu-list-subitem, .tc-menu-list-item, .tc-missing-tiddler-label {
  text-align: left !important;
  padding-left: 1em;
  text-indent: -1em;
}

/* This prevents indent on search results and drop-down entries, otherwise we get odd hover behaviour */

.tc-drop-down div.tc-menu-list-item, li.tc-menu-list-item {
  text-align: left !important;
  padding-left: 0em !important;
  text-indent: 0em !important;
}


.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tag-list-item a.tc-tiddlylink {
   color: white !important;
}

.tc-drop-down a, .tc-drop-down button, .tc-drop-down a.tc-tiddlylink, .tc-drop-down a.tc-tiddlylink-external {
    color: white !important;
}


.tc-drop-down {
   background-color: <> !important;
}

.icon {
  position: relative;
  /* Adjust these values accordingly */
  top: 5px;
  left: 5px;
}

.sidebar {
  background-color: <> !important; 
  color: <> !important;
  border-width: 1px   !important;
  border-style: dotted    !important;
  padding-top:4px   !important;
}


table.plain { border: 0 !important; width: 100% !important; text-align: left !important; border-collapse: collapse !important; margin-left:15px !important; }

table.plain tr:nth-child(odd) { background: transparent; } table.plain tr:nth-child(even) { background: transparent; }

table.plain td, table.plain th { border: 0 !important; vertical-align:top !important; padding: 3px 2px !important; } table.plain tbody td { font-size: 13px !important; vertical-align:top !important; }

table.census {
  font-size: 12px  !important;
  min-width: 75%;
  display: block;
  overflow-x: auto;
  white-space: nowrap;
}
table.census td, table.cls th {
  border: 1px solid #dcdcdc !important;
  vertical-align:top !important;
  padding: 3px 2px !important;
}

table.cls {
  font-size: 12px  !important;
  min-width: 75%;
}
table.cls td, table.cls th {
  border: 1px solid #dcdcdc !important;
  vertical-align:top !important;
  padding: 3px 2px !important;
}

table.realplain { border: 0 !important; width: 100% !important; text-align: left !important; border-collapse: collapse !important;  margin-left:0px !important; margin-top:0px !important; margin-bottom:0px !important; padding-left: 0px !important; padding-right: 0px !important; padding-top: 0px !important; padding-bottom: 0px !important; box-sizing: no}

table.realplain tr:nth-child(odd) { background: transparent; } table.realplain tr:nth-child(even) { background: transparent; }

table.realplain td, table.realplain th { border: 0 !important; vertical-align:top !important;  } table.realplain tbody td { vertical-align:top !important; }



/* Set the MAP modal dialogs (more left and towards the top) to make better use of the screen) */
.tc-modal { top: 4rem; !important;
	right: auto !important;
	left: 15% !important;
}

/* the color picker in the MAP product does not render properly */
.vis-color-picker { min-width: 310px !important;}

/* hide bottom bar, if present lower the z-index */
#navigator-main {
  z-index: 49 !important;
  display:none !important; 
}

/* set the z-order of the sidebar (default is 1500) this is needed to see Maps dialogs */
.tc-sidebar-scrollable { z-index: 30 !important }

.leaflet-container { z-index: 1 !important; }

/* Set height of top bar (this was 3rem) */
.tc-topbar { max-height: 40px !important; }

/* Colour of title in tiddler */
h2.tc-title {
   color: <> !important;
}


.boxes * { margin: 0; padding: 0; width:100% display: flex; }

.boxes ul { padding-top: 20px; position: relative; transition: all 0.5s; -webkit-transition: all 0.5s; -moz-transition: all 0.5s; display: flex; }

.boxes li { float: left; text-align: center; list-style-type: none; position: relative; border: 1px solid #ccc; margin:5px; padding: 5px 10px; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block;

transition: all 0.5s; -webkit-transition: all 0.5s; -moz-transition: all 0.5s; }

.boxes li a { display: inline-block; text-decoration: none; /* disgiuse links to appear like text (until hover) */ color: black; font-style:normal;

transition: all 0.5s; -webkit-transition: all 0.5s; -moz-transition: all 0.5s; }

/*Time for some hover effects*/ /*We will apply the hover effect the the lineage of the element also*/

.boxes li a:hover, .family-tree li a:hover+ul li a { background: #f4f4f4; }

<--simple charts-->

.family-tree * {margin: 0; padding: 0;
}

.family-tree ul {
	padding-top: 20px; position: relative;
	
	transition: all 0.5s;
	-webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
	-moz-transition: all 0.5s;
    display: flex;   
    xxflex-wrap: nowrap;
}

.family-tree li {
	float: left;  text-align: center;
	list-style-type: none;
	position: relative;
	padding: 20px 5px 0 5px; 
	
	transition: all 0.5s;
	-webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
	-moz-transition: all 0.5s;
}

/*We will use ::before and ::after to draw the connectors*/

.family-tree li::before, .family-tree li::after{
	content: "";
	position: absolute; top: 0; right: 50%;
	border-top: 1px solid #ccc;
	width: 50%; height: 20px;
}

.family-tree li::after{
	right: auto; left: 50%;
	border-left: 1px solid #ccc;
}

.family-tree li:first-child 
{ margin-top: 0px !important; }
.family-tree li:not(:last-child) 
{ padding-bottom: 0px !important; }


/*We need to remove left-right connectors from elements without any siblings*/
.family-tree li:only-child::after, .family-tree li:only-child::before {
	display: none;
}

/*Remove space from the top of single children*/
.family-tree li:only-child{ padding-top: 0;}

/*Remove left connector from first child and 
right connector from last child*/
.family-tree li:first-child::before, .family-tree li:last-child::after{
	border: 0 none;
}
/*Adding back the vertical connector to the last nodes*/
.family-tree li:last-child::before{
	border-right: 1px solid #ccc;
	border-radius: 0 5px 0 0;
	-webkit-border-radius: 0 5px 0 0;
	-moz-border-radius: 0 5px 0 0;
}

.family-tree li:first-child::after{
	border-radius: 5px 0 0 0;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px 0 0 0;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px 0 0 0;
}


/*Time to add downward connectors from parents*/
.family-tree ul ul::before{
	content: "";
	position: absolute; top: 0; left: 50%;
	border-left: 1px solid #ccc;
	width: 0; height: 20px;
}

.family-tree li a {
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	padding: 5px 10px;
	xtext-decoration: none;
	color: #666;
	font-family: arial, verdana, tahoma;
	font-size: 11px;
	display: inline-block;
	
	border-radius: 5px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	
	transition: all 0.5s;
	-webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
	-moz-transition: all 0.5s;
}

/*Time for some hover effects*/
/*We will apply the hover effect the the lineage of the element also*/
.family-tree li a:hover, .family-tree li a:hover+ul li a {
	background: #c8e4f8; color: #000; border: 1px solid #94a0b4;
}
/*Connector styles on hover*/
.family-tree li a:hover+ul li::after, 
.family-tree li a:hover+ul li::before, 
.family-tree li a:hover+ul::before, 
.family-tree li a:hover+ul ul::before{
	border-color:  #94a0b4;
}

text:
!!!!General Settings |!Setting |!Value | |! Show sidebar on the left:|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="sidebar" checked="left" unchecked="" default="">Show sidebar on the left side of the screen
This moves the Memory Keeper sidebar to the left side of the screen.| |! Show Age:|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="showage" checked="show" unchecked="" default=""> Show Age
This field is a global setting that will show an individual's age as of today (now) when no death event is defined for that individual. This behaviour only occurs on the person tiddler.| |! Show surname:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/mk/collection" field="surname-opacity" default="0.15" />
Opacity of surname shown in person tiddler header. Set to 0 to hide and 1 for 100%. Default is 0.1 which is 10%. | |! Dates shown on charts/pedigree:|<$select tooltip='Choose date shown on pedigree' tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field='pedigreedate' default=''>
<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/cls/collection" stateField="pedigreedate" type="match" text="">This option will show, on pedigree charts, dates or the value found in round brackets in the person caption field, otherwise actual event birth and death dates are shown.<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/cls/collection" stateField="pedigreedate" type="match" text="fulldate">Only show event birth and death dates (do not show caption dates).<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/cls/collection" stateField="pedigreedate" type="match" text="captiondate">Only show dates from person caption field (do not show event dates).

NOTE: Changing this configuration field may not take immediate effect. Existing charts may need to be refreshed.
| |! Custom Help Path:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/mk/collection" field="help-path" default=""/>
When no path is defined help is opened at https://clsturgeon.github.io/MemoryKeeper/| |! MK e-book stylesheet:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/mk/collection" field="e-book-css" default="show"/>
When this value is not 'hide' MK will use the built-in stylesheets for e-books. You may want to hide this when you add your own e-book stylesheet tiddlers. | |! Filename prefix:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Filename" field="format" default=""/>
This field, if populated on startup, will be used to determine a default filename when you come to saving your changes. Leave this field empty for TWs default behaviour. | |! Change Management:|<$select tooltip='Choose state of Change Management' tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field='change-set' default='disabled'>
Enabling Change Management allows you to optionally export a change set for each TiddlyWiki edit session.
Default setting: disabled| |! Citation Template:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="citation-template" default=""/>
This field, if populated, defines a custom citation template. See help documentation for details.| |! Enable leaflet maps|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="leaflet-enabled" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show"> Show Leaflet maps| |! Default leafmap map:|<$select tooltip='Choose state of Change Management' tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field='default-leafmap' default='osm'>

This field defines the default leafmap.| |! Enable Google maps|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="googlemaps-enabled" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show"> Show Google Maps| |! GTP Model (Chat-GPT):|<$select tooltip='Choose a GPT Model' tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field='gptmodel' default='gpt-3.5-turbo'>

GPT language model. | |! System Message (Chat-GPT):|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/cls/mk/systemmessage" field="format" default=""/>
This field defines the system message used to instruct chat-GPT who you are. It helps configure the responses. The default value is "I am a historical researcher." | !!!!Performance Settings These settings, if populated, define the maximum number of the selected object. Helps with performance when there are hundreds of records. Recommended value is 100 for each. |!Setting |!Value | |! Assertion Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="assertion-max" default=""/>
The number of assertion records to be listed on the [[Assertions]] page. | |! Citation Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="citation-max" default=""/>
The number of citation records to be listed on the [[Citations]] page. | |! Evidence Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="evidence-max" default=""/>
The number of evidence entries to be listed on the [[Evidence]] page.| |! People Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="person-max" default=""/>
The number of people to be listed on the [[People]] page.| |! Photograph Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="photograph-max" default=""/>
The number of photographs to be listed on the [[Photographs]] page.| |! Places Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="place-max" default=""/>
The number of places to be listed on the [[Places]] page.| |! Events Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="event-max" default=""/>
The number of events to be listed on the [[Events]] page.| |! Sources Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="source-max" default=""/>
The number of sources to be listed on the [[Sources]] page.| |! Notes Limit:|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field="note-max" default=""/>
The number of notes to be listed on the [[Notes]] page.|

/* projectify CSS Overrides */

.pika-prev,
.is-rtl .pika-next {
    float: left;
    background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,') !important;
}

.pika-next,
.is-rtl .pika-prev {
    float: right;
    background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABQAAAAeCAYAAAAsEj5rAAAATUlEQVRIx+3TMQoAIAwEwaDvD9yPz9JCbHQLhcwD1ogxopTH2U46aDTqKekgE/Uq6eBd1HvbaDs8q5MTiryyyEcRuTYiF1vk11OU8qEBELy9iu22cFwAAAAASUVORK5CYII=') !important;
}

/* Navigator CSS Overrides */
.border-box { max-width: none !important; }
.tc-message-box { color: white !important; border-color: <<themecolor>> !important; background: <<themeoppositecolor>> !important; }

  /* Page break before each tiddler like chapters in a book */
  .tc-tiddler-frame { page-break-after: always; }

<$reveal state="$:/state/fieldeditor" text="hide" type="match">
.tc-edit-type-selector-wrapper {display: none !important}
.tc-edit-fields {display: none !important}
.tc-edit-field-add {display: none !important}
</$reveal>

.sortcolumn { display: none;}

<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/mk/peopleview" stateField="sortfield" text="column1sort" type=match>
#col1 { display: inline !important;}
</$reveal>
<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/mk/peopleview" stateField="sortfield" text="column3sort" type=match>
#col3 { display: inline !important;}
</$reveal>
<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/mk/peopleview" stateField="sortfield" text="column2sort" type=match>
#col2 { display: inline !important;}
</$reveal>

<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/mk/peopleview" stateField="sortfield" text="column1maxsort" type=match>
#col1 { display: inline !important;}
</$reveal>
<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/mk/peopleview" stateField="sortfield" text="column3maxsort" type=match>
#col3 { display: inline !important;}
</$reveal>
<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/mk/peopleview" stateField="sortfield" text="column2maxsort" type=match>
#col2 { display: inline !important;}
</$reveal>

.chatgpt-conversation-user p {
  font-size: 13px;
  width: calc(100% - 55px);
}
.chatgpt-conversation-assistant p {
font-size: 13px;
}

.ellipsis3 {
  position: absolute;
  top:calc(100% - 185px);
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 3;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.ellipsis2 {
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.delete-button {right: 30px !important;} 

<!---
.edit-button {right: 0px; !important; top: 20px;}
.delete-button {right: 16px !important; top: 20px;}  -->

.outer{
padding-left:10px;
border-left:2px solid <<themecolor>>;
}
.inner{
padding-left:20px;
}

.paperclip, .noteclip {
   z-index:100; position:absolute; right: 18px; height: 80px; pointer-events: none 
}
.paperclip {
  top:16px;
}
.noteclip {
  top:12px;
}

.tc-block-dropdown a:hover { color: rgb(245, 245, 245); background-color: <<themecolor>> !important; text-decoration: none; }

<!--
@media (max-width: 500px) {
 .tc-sidebar-scrollable { max-width:100% !important; width:100% !important; }
} -->

<$reveal stateTitle="$:/config/cls/collection" stateField="sidebar" type=match text="left">
   .tc-sidebar-scrollable { left: 0 !important; right: auto !important; } 
   <$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="match" text="no">
      @media (max-width: 750px) {
         .tc-story-river { margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; } 
      }
      @media (min-width: 90rem) {
         .tc-story-river { margin-right: calc(26rem + 1rem); margin-left: auto; } 
      }
   </$reveal>
   <$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no">
       .tc-story-river { margin-left: calc(26rem + 1rem) !important; margin-right: auto !important; } 
   </$reveal>
</$reveal>

div.item-link blockquote {background: transparent !important; }

div.item-link blockquote.titlequote:before { color: <<ebookthemecolor>> !important; }

table.groupsheet { border: 0 !important; width: 100% !important; text-align: left !important; border-collapse: collapse !important; background: transparent;}

table.groupsheet tr:nth-child(odd) { background: transparent; } table.groupsheet tr:nth-child(even) { background: transparent; }

table.groupsheet td, table.groupsheet th { border: 0 !important; vertical-align:top !important; padding: 3px 12px 3px 12px !important;  background: transparent;} table.groupsheet tbody td { font-size: 10px !important; vertical-align:top !important;  background: transparent; }

details.timeline summary {
    background-color: <<themecolor>>;
    color: white;
}

.surname {color: <<themecolor>>; opacity: <<surnameopacity>>;}

.searchselect {
  min-width: 300px;
}

/* toolbar */
.tc-editor-toolbar button {
  margin-left: 0 !important;
  border-radius: 0 !important;
  border-width: 1px !important;
  border:-color: black !important;
  background-color: transparent !important;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button:hover {
  background-color: grey !important;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button.tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-start-group {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px rgb(64 64 64) !important;
}

<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no">
span.tc-topbar-right {display: block !important; width: 30px !important; height: 30px !important; background: transparent !important; border-width: 0 !important; box-shadow: 0 0 !important; z-index: 100 !important;}
span.tc-topbar-right > button > svg.tc-image-advanced-search-button { height: 25px; width: 25px; fill: white !important; }
</$reveal>

.kk-tl-gilan {

.urgent svg {fill: red !important; }

.nomapcontainer {position: relative; text-align: center; width: 100%}

.searchicon .urgent svg {fill: red !important; }
.searchicon .important svg {fill: orange !important ; }

/* Tool Tips */

.tooltip {
 position: relative;
 display: inline-block; 
 border-bottom: 1px dotted black; /* If you want dots under the hoverable text */
}

/* Show the tooltip text when you mouse over the tooltip container */
.tooltip:hover .tooltiptext2 {
  visibility: visible;
}

.tooltip:hover .tooltiptext {
  visibility: visible;
}

span.tooltip {
 color: #00449e;
}

span.tooltiptext {
 color: #00449;
}

/* Tooltip text */
.tooltip .tooltiptext {
 visibility: hidden;
 width: 120px;
 background-color: <<themecolor>>;
 color: #fff;
 line-height: 80% !important;
 padding: 15px 15px 15px 15px !important;
 border-radius: 6px;
 font-size: 12px !important;
 /* Position the tooltip text - see examples below! */
 position: absolute;
 z-index: 1;
}

.tooltip .tooltiptext p { font-size: 12pt; }

.tooltip .tooltiptext .cit .citation .tc-reveal {
 line-height: 80% !important;
}

.citation-url a:link {
 color: gray;
 font-weight: bold;
}

.tooltip .tooltiptext {
 width: 250px;
 bottom: 100%;
 left: 50%;
 margin-left: -140px; /* Use half of the width (120/2 = 60), to center the tooltip */
}

.tooltip .citation-url {
 font-size: 11px !important;
}

/* add arrow to tooltip bubble */
.tooltip .tooltiptext::after {
 content: " ";
 position: absolute;
 top: 100%; /* At the bottom of the tooltip */
 left: 50%;
 margin-left: -5px;
 border-width: 5px;
 border-style: solid;
 border-color: #025881 transparent transparent transparent;
}

.tooltip .citation{
 font-size: 11px !important;
 line-spacing: 1
}

/*  Boxes */

.boxes * { margin: 0; padding: 0; width:100% display: flex; }

.boxes ul { padding-top: 20px; position: relative; transition: all 0.5s; -webkit-transition: all 0.5s; -moz-transition: all 0.5s; display: flex; }

.boxes li { float: left; text-align: center; list-style-type: none; position: relative; border: 1px solid #ccc; margin:5px; padding: 5px 10px; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block;

transition: all 0.5s; -webkit-transition: all 0.5s; -moz-transition: all 0.5s; }

.boxes li a { display: inline-block; text-decoration: none; /* disgiuse links to appear like text (until hover) */ color: black; font-style:normal;

transition: all 0.5s; -webkit-transition: all 0.5s; -moz-transition: all 0.5s; }

/*Time for some hover effects*/ /*We will apply the hover effect the the lineage of the element also*/

.boxes li a:hover, .family-tree li a:hover+ul li a { background: #f4f4f4; }

/* pedigree charts */

.family-tree * {margin: 0; padding: 0;
}

.family-tree ul {
 padding-top: 20px; position: relative;
 transition: all 0.5s;
 -webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
 -moz-transition: all 0.5s;
 display: flex;   
 xxflex-wrap: nowrap;
}

.family-tree li {
 float: left;  text-align: center;
 list-style-type: none;
 position: relative;
 padding: 20px 5px 0 5px; 
 transition: all 0.5s;
 -webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
 -moz-transition: all 0.5s;
}

.family-tree li::before, .family-tree li::after{
 content: "";
 position: absolute; top: 0; right: 50%;
 border-top: 1px solid #ccc;
 width: 50%; height: 20px;
}

.family-tree li::after{
 right: auto; left: 50%;
 border-left: 1px solid #ccc;
}

.family-tree li:first-child 
{ margin-top: 0px !important; }
.family-tree li:not(:last-child) 
{ padding-bottom: 0px !important; }

.family-tree li:only-child::after, .family-tree li:only-child::before {
 display: none;
}

.family-tree li:only-child{ padding-top: 0;}

.family-tree li:first-child::before, .family-tree li:last-child::after{
 border: 0 none;
}

.family-tree li:last-child::before{
 border-right: 1px solid #ccc;
 border-radius: 0 5px 0 0;
 -webkit-border-radius: 0 5px 0 0;
 -moz-border-radius: 0 5px 0 0;
}

.family-tree li:first-child::after{
 border-radius: 5px 0 0 0;
 -webkit-border-radius: 5px 0 0 0;
 -moz-border-radius: 5px 0 0 0;
}

.family-tree ul ul::before{
 content: "";
 position: absolute; top: 0; left: 50%;
 border-left: 1px solid #ccc;
 width: 0; height: 20px;
}

.family-tree li a {
 border: 1px solid #ccc;
 padding: 5px 10px;
 xtext-decoration: none;
 color: #666;
 font-family: arial, verdana, tahoma;
 font-size: 11px;
 display: inline-block;
 border-radius: 5px;
 -webkit-border-radius: 5px;
 -moz-border-radius: 5px;
 transition: all 0.5s;
 -webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
 -moz-transition: all 0.5s;
}

.main {
 margin: auto;
 max-width: 900px;
 padding: 2rem;
}

.lead-text {
 margin-bottom: 60px;
 text-align: center;
}

progress {
 display: block;
}

.pedprogress { 
  color: <<themecolor>> !important; 
  fill: <<themecolor>> !important; 
}

.pedigree  {
 width: 100% !important;
 border-collapse: separate !important;
 border-spacing: 0 !important;
}
.pedigree  th,
  td {
   vertical-align: bottom !important;
  }

.pedigree  th { 
   border-bottom: 2px solid black !important;
   text-align: left;
  }

.pedigree  .bio {
   vertical-align: top !important;
  }
  
.pedigree  td {
   padding-left: 1rem !important;
   padding-bottom: 0.25rem !important;
  }

.pedigree .grand {
    padding-top: 2rem !important;
  }

  .line-bottom {
    border-bottom: 1px solid black !important;
  }

.cellname {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 8px;
  width: calc(100% - 65px);
  left:15px;
}

  .line-left-down {
    border-left: 1px solid black !important;
  }

  .line-left-up {
    border-left: 1px solid black !important;
  }

  .line-left {
    border-left: 1px solid white !important;
  }

.edit-version { width: 50%; }
.edit-description { width: 100%; }

/*Time for some hover effects*/
/*We will apply the hover effect the the lineage of the element also*/
.family-tree li a:hover, .family-tree li a:hover+ul li a {
	background: #c8e4f8; color: #000; border: 1px solid #94a0b4;
}
/*Connector styles on hover*/
.family-tree li a:hover+ul li::after, 
.family-tree li a:hover+ul li::before, 
.family-tree li a:hover+ul::before, 
.family-tree li a:hover+ul ul::before{
	border-color:  #94a0b4;
}

.item-title {
   text-align:left;
}

.item-link {
   text-align:left;
}

.item-timedate {
   display: none !important
}

.kk-tl-kerman ul li {
   width: 95%;
   page-break-inside: avoid;
   break-inside: avoid;
}

.hideimages img { display: none !important;}

}

.sq-float-editor-menu {
	background: #fff;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 10px 10px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.35);
	-moz-box-shadow: 10px 10px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.35);
	box-shadow: 10px 10px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.35);
	border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
	border: 0px solid #000000;
	max-width: {{$:/config/sq/EditorToolbar/width}}px;
}

.toolbar-config-all-btn .tc-btn-invisible.tc-btn-mini {
	display: none;
}

.toolbar-config-all-btn svg,
.toolbar-config-enabled-btn svg {
	width: 18px;
	height: 18px;
}

.sq-config-editor-toolbar,
.sq-config-editor-toolbar .tc-droppable {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.sq-config-editor-toolbar {
	max-width: {{$:/config/sq/EditorToolbar/width}}px;
}

.sq-config-editor-toolbar button {
	font-size: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/fontsize}};
}

.sq-config-editor-toolbar .tc-droppable.tc-dragover > .tc-droppable-placeholder {
	display: inline;
	width: 2em;
}

.tc-droppable.tc-dragover + .tc-droppable .tc-droppable-placeholder {
display:block !important;
width: 2em;
height: 2em;
	border: 2px dashed <<colour dropzone-background>>;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar.sq-config-editor-toolbar > .tc-droppable:last-child .tc-droppable-placeholder  {
display: block;
width: 2em;
height: 2em;
}

/* lightbox */

span.cssbox_full {
  z-index: 2400;
  position: fixed;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: opacity 0.5s linear;
}

span.cssbox_full img {
  position: fixed;
  background-color: white;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  max-height: 90%;
  max-width: 90%;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-right: -50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  box-shadow: 0 0 20px black;
}

a.cssbox_close {
  z-index: 2500;
  position: fixed;
  text-decoration: none;
  visibility: hidden;
  color: white;
  font-size: 36px;
}

a.cssbox_close {
  top: 1%;
  right: 1%
}

a.cssbox_close::after {
  content: '\00d7';
}

a:target ~ a.cssbox_close {
  visibility: visible;
}

a:target > img.cssbox_thumb + span.cssbox_full {
  visibility: visible;
  opacity: 1;
  pointer-events: initial;
}

span.cssbox_full {
  cursor: initial;
}

.image-no_drag {
	-webkit-user-drag: none;
	-khtml-user-drag: none;
	-moz-user-drag: none;
	-o-user-drag: none;
	user-drag: none;
}

/* Add Animation - Zoom in the Modal */
a:target > img.cssbox_thumb + span.cssbox_full  {
  animation-name: zoom;
  animation-duration: 0.6s;
}

@keyframes zoom {
  from {transform:scale(0)}
  to {transform:scale(1)}
}

/* pin-it */

/* Some positioning and ratios */
.pinit-container {
  max-width: 240px;
  position: relative;
}

.pinit-outer {
  /* display: flex; */
  padding-top: 92.5925926%;
  position: relative;

  width: 100%;
}

.pinit {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  color: black !important;
}

.pinit a.tc-tiddlylink {
 color: black !important;
}

.pinit p {
  line-height: 16.5px !important;
  font-family: 'Kalam', cursive !important;
  font-size: 13px !important;
  text-align: left !important;
}

/* Shadow behind the sticky note */
.pinit:before {
  box-shadow: -2px 2px 15px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
  content: ' ';
  width: 90%;
  left: 5px;
  height: 75%;
  position: absolute;
  top: 30%;
}

/* The sticky note itself */
.pinit-content, .pinit-content-blue {
  background: linear-gradient(
    180deg,
    rgba(187, 235, 255, 1) 0%,
    rgba(187, 235, 255, 1) 12%,
    rgba(170, 220, 241, 1) 75%,
    rgba(195, 229, 244, 1) 100%
  );
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

  /* display: flex; */
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  font-family: 'Kalam', cursive;
  font-size: 1.0rem;
  padding-right: 12px;
  padding-left: 12px;

  clip-path: url(#stickyClip);
}
.pinit-content-nopriority {
  background: linear-gradient(
    180deg,
    rgba(190, 194, 203, 1) 0%,
    rgba(190, 194, 203, 1) 12%,
    rgba(180, 179, 187, 1) 75%,
    rgba(170, 169, 173, 10) 100%
  );
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

  /* display: flex; */
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  font-family: 'Kalam', cursive;
  font-size: 1.0rem;
  padding-right: 12px;
  padding-left: 12px;

  clip-path: url(#stickyClip);
}

.pinit-content-urgent {
  background: linear-gradient(
    180deg,
    rgba(255, 205, 203, 1) 0%,
    rgba(255, 205, 203, 1) 12%,
    rgba(255, 206, 203, 1) 75%,
    rgba(255, 206, 203, 10) 100%
  );
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

  /* display: flex; */
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  font-family: 'Kalam', cursive;
  font-size: 1.0rem;
  padding-right: 12px;
  padding-left: 12px;

  clip-path: url(#stickyClip);
}

.pinit-content-important {
  background: linear-gradient(
    180deg,
    rgba(255, 159, 0, 1) 0%,
    rgba(255, 160, 0, 1) 12%,
    rgba(255, 165, 0, 1) 75%,
    rgba(255, 170, 0, 10) 100%
  );
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

  /* display: flex; */
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  font-family: 'Kalam', cursive;
  font-size: 1.0rem;
  padding-right: 12px;
  padding-left: 12px;

  clip-path: url(#stickyClip);
}

.pinit-content-review {
  background: linear-gradient(
    180deg,
	 rgba(60, 192, 115, 1) 0%,
    rgba(60, 192, 120, 1) 12%,
    rgba(60, 179, 130, 1) 75%,
    rgba(60, 177, 145, 10) 100%
  );
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

  /* display: flex; */
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  font-family: 'Kalam', cursive;
  font-size: 1.0rem;
  padding-right: 12px;
  padding-left: 12px;

  clip-path: url(#stickyClip);
}

.pinit-content-yellow {
  background: linear-gradient(
    180deg,
	 rgba(255, 255, 153, 1) 0%,
    rgba(255, 255, 153, 1) 12%,
    rgba(248, 248, 150, 1) 75%,
    rgba(240, 240, 147, 10) 100%
  );
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

  /* display: flex; */
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  font-family: 'Kalam', cursive;
  font-size: 1.0rem;
  padding-right: 12px;
  padding-left: 12px;

  clip-path: url(#stickyClip);
}

/* Position the sticky nicely, so it looks better */

.container {
  /* display: flex; */
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 250px;
  height: 100%;
}
.container-inner {
  width: 90%;
  margin: 25px;
position: relative;
top: -25px;
}

.container-inner {
  width: 90%;
}

/* Tab definitions */

.clslists {display:none}  
.clstest {display:none}  
.clstabs {display:none}

$label$ (<>) <$macrocall $name=copy field="$field$" /><$button tooltip="reset $field$ to: $originalvalue$" style="font-size: 10px"><$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!title}} $field$="$originalvalue$" />Reset $field$
<$reveal default="0" type="nomatch" text=<>> <$select multiple field='$field$' size=<>><$list filter={{!!$field$}}><$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Advanced search lookup $label$" aria-label="Advanced search lookup $label$"> <$set name="fieldVal" value={{{ [get[$field$]] }}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" $field="text" $value=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/advancedsearch' text=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/advancedsearch/refresh' text='yes'/><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/advancedsearch/currentTab" text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"/><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803" text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"/><$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch"/> <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-focus-selector' $param='.tc-advanced-search input' />{{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} <$list filter="[all[current]each:list-item[$field$]is[missing]count[]]" variable=result><$reveal default="0" type="match" text=<>>
Select $label$ (<$count filter="[all[current]each:list-item[$field$]]"/> of <$reveal type=match default="$tagger2$" text=""><$count filter="[tag[$tagger$]]"/><$reveal type=nomatch default="$tagger2$" text=""><$count filter="[tag[$tagger$]tag[$tagger2$]]"/>)

Filter/Search <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/References/searchstrings" field=dialog-search placeholder="type your search" tag=input/> <$button tooltip="clear search field" set="$:/config/References/searchstrings!!dialog-search" setTo="" >{{$:/plugins/cls/mk/images/clear}}<$button tooltip="Add $tagger$"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title={{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!dialog-search}} tags="$tagger$ $tagger2$" /> +

<$reveal type=match default="$tagger2$" text=""> <$select class="select-option" multiple size='12' field='$field$'><$list filter='[tag[$tagger$]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!dialog-search}] [all[current]each:list-item[$field$]] -[has[draft.of]] +[sort[title]]'> <$reveal type=nomatch default="$tagger2$" text=""> <$select class="select-option" multiple size='12' field='$field$'><$list filter='[tag[$tagger$]tag[$tagger2$]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!dialog-search}] [all[current]each:list-item[$field$]] -[has[draft.of]] +[sort[title]]'>

<$let thistiddler={{!!title}}> <$list filter="[all[current]each:list-item[$field$]is[missing]count[]]" variable=result2><$reveal default="0" type="nomatch" text=<>>
The $field$ list has <> missing entries in the $field$ field.
<$list filter='[all[current]each:list-item[$field$]is[missing]]'><$let value={{!!title}}><$button tooltip="remove" style="font-size: 10px"><$action-listops $field="$field$" $tiddler=<> $subfilter="-[]" />Remove <> <$button tooltip="Add $tagger$"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags="$tagger$ $tagger2$" /> +

\end \define dataselector(id:"" field:"subsystem" originalvalue:"" label:"" dialogid:"55")
<$set name="datacount" filter="[all[current]each:list-item[$field$]count[]]">
$label$ (<>)<$button tooltip="reset $field$ to: $originalvalue$" style="font-size: 10px"><$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!title}} $field$="$originalvalue$" />Reset $field$
<$reveal default="0" type="nomatch" text=<>> <$select multiple field='$field$' size=<>><$list filter={{!!$field$}}>
Select $label$

\end <$reveal text="hide" default={{$:/state/fieldeditor}} type=match><$button set="$:/state/fieldeditor" setTo="show" tooltip="show TW edit fields">{{$:/core/images/unfold-button}}<$reveal text="hide" default={{$:/state/fieldeditor}} type=nomatch><$button set="$:/state/fieldeditor" setTo="hide" tooltip="hide TW edit fields">{{$:/core/images/unfold-button}}
Image/Icon fields Person fields Chart fields Place fields Event fields Indigenous Nation fields Alliance fields Photograph fields Note fields Organization fields Source fields Citation fields Video fields YouTube fields Camera fields Postcard fields Audio fields Photo Essay fields Cover Page fields Front Flap fields Back Flap fields Dust Jacket fields Half Title fields Frontispiece fields Title Page fields Colonphon fields Dedication fields Epigraph fields TOC fields Forward fields Preface fields Acknowledgements fields Introduction fields Prologue fields Prologue fields Evidence fields Evidence data fields Data-field fields Project fields Task fields Event Role fields Virtual Aide fields Data fields Quote fields Vehicle fields Object fields E-book statistics Chapter fields Section fields Epilogue fields Outro fields Afterword fields Conclusion fields Appendix fields Glossary fields Bibliography fields Back Cover fields
Approximately <$set filter="[all[current]get[text]split[ ]splitregexp[\n]!is[blank]count[]]" name=wordcount> <> words.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="caption" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="caption" />
Provide the complete birth name of the individual, optionally followed by any professional titles, and enclosed within brackets the years of birth and death.
Approximately <$set filter="[tag[chapter]contains:e-book{!!draft.title}get[text]split[ ]splitregexp[\n]!is[blank]count[]]" name=wordcount> <> words.

<$checkbox class=cuslabel field="showage" checked="show" unchecked="" default=""> Show Age
When no death event is specified for an individual, this setting will display their current age as of today. It applies only to the person tiddler.

<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="birthorder" />
Please provide the individual's birth order which corresponds to their position among their siblings in relation to both parents.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="caption" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="caption" />
Enter an alternative title that will be displayed in search results, menu, and graphs.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="email" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="email" />
Provide the contact email address(es), separating each address with a semicolon.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="date"/> <$macrocall $name=copy field="date" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="date" />
Provide the date in the format of YYYY-MM-DD.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="time"/> <$macrocall $name=copy field="time" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="time" />
The time should be in the format of HH:MM:SS[Z]. By default, the time is assumed to be in local time. However, if the suffix 'Z' is added, it conforms to the ISO standard for Universal Time or Zulu Time.


<$select tooltip='Choose source state:' field='sourcestate' default='new'>
<$reveal state="!!sourcestate" type="match" text="new">The source has been added to the collection, and you have yet to commence the review process.<$reveal state="!!sourcestate" type="match" text="">The source has been added to the collection, and you have yet to commence the review process.<$reveal state="!!sourcestate" type="match" text="under review">The source is currently undergoing review.<$reveal state="!!sourcestate" type="match" text="reviewed">The review of the source is finished.


<$select tooltip='Choose type of source' field='type-of-source' default='Narrative'>
<$reveal state="!!type-of-source" type="match" text="Original">Original records were initially created to document a particular event, typically at or around the time the event occurred, with the informants being present. Any precise and accurate reproduction of the original document, such as scanned images, can also be considered an original record.<$reveal state="!!type-of-source" type="match" text="Derivative">Derivative records include information whose informant was not physically present at the event, such as copied, abstracted, transcribed, or compiled information. In general, the more distant the copies are from the original document, the higher the likelihood of introduced errors.<$reveal state="!!type-of-source" type="match" text="Narrative">Narrative sources are materials like history books or written family histories.<$reveal state="!!type-of-source" type="match" text="">Narrative sources are materials like history books or written family histories.


<$select tooltip='Choose type of information' field='type-of-information' default='Other'>
<$reveal state="!!type-of-information" type="match" text="Primary">Primary information refers to statements made by individuals who had firsthand knowledge of an event or witnessed it themselves. It was typically made at or near the time of the event.<$reveal state="!!type-of-information" type="match" text="Secondary">Secondary information pertains to statements made by individuals who were not active participants in an event or did not observe it firsthand. Examples include family oral traditions, abstracts and transcripts of records, and online genealogical databases.<$reveal state="!!type-of-information" type="match" text="Other"If the source does not fit within the categories of Primary or Secondary, select "Other".

<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="slidetag" />
Tag used identify the photographs that will appear in the slideshow.
<$reveal text="" type=nomatch default={{!!slidetag}}> <$macrocall $name=tidexist tiddler={{!!slidetag}} />

<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="divorced" />
The date of a divorce in the format YYYY-MM-DD

<$macrocall $name=copy field="aka" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="aka" />
The AKA field is intended for any other names, including nicknames, that this person may have used. Use this field as a Title List, whether or not you decide to create a tiddler for each name.

<$checkbox class=cuslabel tag="pin-it">pin-it
Checking this setting will create pin-it notes on associated tiddlers.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="description" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="4" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag="textarea" field="description" />
A short description.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="quote" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="quote" />
Use this field for the quote.

<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="quotee" />
Use this field for the quotee.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="quote-format"/>
<$select tooltip='Format:' field='quote-format' default='none'>

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="icon"/> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="icon" /><$button popup=<> tooltip="Select Icon" style="color:white" class="cuslabel">Select Icon<$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
''Insert Image for Icon'' <> <$macrocall $name="image-picker" filter="[tag[$:/tags/Image]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!icon-search}sort[title]]" actions=""" <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=icon $value=<> /> <$action-popup $state=<> /> """/>
Reference an image tiddler

<$macrocall $name=copy field="pdf" /><$button tooltip="paste pdf relative path from clipboard" style="font-size: 10px" aria-label="Paste pdf relative path" actions=<> ><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/notifier" text=""/> <$text text="Paste pdf relative path" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="2" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag=textarea field="pdf"/>
Relative path to a PDF document.

<$button style="float:right; font-size:12px"><$link to={{!!pdftitle}}>View PDF TOC
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="pdftitle" />
Short unique title of the pdf file. Leave this field empty unless you want to build a custom table of contents for the PDF document.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="youtube" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="2" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag=textarea field="youtube"/>
URL to youtube video.
<$button tooltip="paste audio relative path from clipboard" style="font-size: 10px" aria-label="Patse audio relative path" actions=<> ><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/notifier" text=""/> <$text text="Paste audio relative path" />
<$macrocall $name=copy field="audio" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="2" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag=textarea field="audio"/>
Relative path to an audio file.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="image" /><$button tooltip="paste image format from clipboard" style="font-size: 10px" aria-label="Paste image format" actions=<> ><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/notifier" text=""/> <$text text="Paste image format" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="2" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag=textarea field="image"/>
HTML or WikiText for an image.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="_canonical_uri" /><$button tooltip="paste image format from clipboard" style="font-size: 10px" aria-label="Paste image format" actions=<> ><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/notifier" text=""/> <$text text="Paste image format" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="2" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag=textarea field="_canonical_uri"/>

<$macrocall $name=copy field="thumbnail" /><$button tooltip="paste image format from clipboard" style="font-size: 10px" aria-label="Paste image format" actions=<> ><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/notifier" text=""/> <$text text="Paste image format" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="2" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag=textarea field="thumbnail"/>
HTML or WikiText for the thumbnail image.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="photocaption" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="4" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag=textarea field="photocaption"/>
Caption associated with image.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="caption" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="caption" />
Enter alternate title for photograph.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="tweetid" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="tweetid" />
tweet ID

<$macrocall $name=copy field="point" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="point" />
Comma separated lattitude and longitude of this place. Ideally copy and paste this from Google Maps. i.e. 90.000000, -135.000002

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="foundingdate"/> <$macrocall $name=copy field="foundingdate" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="foundingdate" />
Inception, date of establishment.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="color" />
<$edit-text tiddler=<> field=color type="color" default="#50966e" />
Colour of map pin used with Leaflet maps. This will not be used on Google Maps.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="googlemap" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="3" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag="textarea" field="googlemap"/>
Not to be confused with googlemaps. URL to GoogleMaps that references this place. This should only be provided if point field is supplied.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="googlemaps" />
<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" rows="3" minHeight="2em" tiddler=<> tag="textarea" field="googlemaps"/>
Not to confused with googlemap. This is an iframe that can be embedded in the tiddler.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="citation-title" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-title" />
Citation title.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="citation-year"/> <$macrocall $name=copy field="citation-year" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-year" />
Citation year.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="citation-author"/> <$macrocall $name=copy field="citation-author" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-author" />
Citation author.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="citation-title-of-source" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-title-of-source" />
Title of the source.

<$macrocall $name=copy field="citation-contributors" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-contributors" />
Contributors are introduced with their role (ex: Edited by, Translated by, Performance by,) followed by their name (First Last). Some contributors must be cited (editors, directors). Other contributors are optional (ex: performers, costume directors, screenwriters) and should be included if they are relevant to your writing

<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-version" />
Version is used to indicate which version of a work was consulted (ex: King James Version, Kindle ed., 3rd ed., revised ed.)

<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-number" />
Number (ex: vol. 6, no. 2; season 8, episode 5) identifies a numbered work in a serial or multivolume publication (ex: journal article, TV episode, encyclopedia volume).

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="citation-organization"/> <$macrocall $name=copy field="citation-organization" /> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-organization" />
Publisher identifies the person or organization that makes the source available to the public (ex: professional organization, publisher, museum). Do not repeat the publisher’s name if it appears elsewhere in the citation.

<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-location" />
Location indicates where to find cited information (ex: page numbers of a journal article, URL, DOI, or a physical location like a museum). Do not include https:// when citing a URL. Use a DOI or permalink instead of a long URL if available.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="repository"/> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="repository" />
Repository name that houses the source.

<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="page" />
Page number that contents the information.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="citation-url"/> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="citation-url" />
URL of source

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="url"/> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" field="url" />
URL of source


<$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> rows="6" minHeight="2em" tag=textarea field="citation-annotation"/>

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="classification"/> <$edit-text class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" tiddler=<> tag="input" rows="1" field="classification" />
Use this field to define classifications for the vehicles.


<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="typeofevidence"/> <$select tooltip='Choose type the type of evidence' field='typeofevidence' default='direct'>

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="strength"/>
<$select tooltip='Choose evidence strength' field='strength' default='weak'>
<$reveal state="!!strength" type="match" text="strong">The research has high confidence that the evidence is true.<$reveal state="!!strength" type="match" text="moderate">The researcher believes the evidence is accurate.<$reveal state="!!strength" type="match" text="weak">The evidence is questionable. It could be based on a narrative or an opinon.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="infovalue"/>
<$select tooltip='Choose evidence information value' field='infovalue' default='incomplete'>
<$reveal state="!!infovalue" type="match" text="incomplete">Regardless of accuracy, there are missing elements in the evidence. e.g. supplies a year but not the full date<$reveal state="!!infovalue" type="match" text="complete">Regardless of accuracy, all the elements needed for an assertion are available.<$reveal state="!!infovalue" type="match" text="none">No evidence found (typically create this type of entry when evidence was expected to be found. Example: birth date on a memorial.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="conflictvalue"/>
<$select tooltip='Choose evidence conflicting value' field='conflictvalue' default='unknown'>
<$reveal state="!!conflictvalue" type="match" text="unknown">There are no supporting sources or facts to validate this source.<$reveal state="!!conflictvalue" type="match" text="none">Does not conflict with other known sources or facts. <$reveal state="!!conflictvalue" type="match" text="discrepancy">A lack of compatibility or similarity between one or more sources or facts. Identify the types of descrepancies in the body of the text above; such as: spelling, names, dates, places and relationships.<$reveal state="!!conflictvalue" type="match" text="contradicting">Evidence that contridicts itself. Typically found in narratives.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="proof"/>
<$select tooltip='Choose type of proof' field='proof' default='none'>
<$reveal state="!!proof" type="match" text="statement">Proof statement is a set of supporting points that prove a claim to be true.<$reveal state="!!proof" type="match" text="summary">Proof Summary is a simple recitation or list of quality sources that support a conclusion. It may be placed in a reference note. It might be presented as a standalone table. Or it might be woven into our narrative. The proof summary is appropriate when all evidence is direct and no evidence conflicts.<$reveal state="!!proof" type="match" text="argument">Proof Argument is a well-reasoned and carefully documented explanation of a research problem, the process by which it was solved, and the evidence that supports the conclusion. It may be long. It may be short. Length usually depends upon the complexity of the problem. Typically, proof arguments are used when conclusions are based on indirect, complex, or conflicting evidence.

<$macrocall $name=AdvancedLookup field="rate"/>
<$select tooltip='Choose the rate of proof' field='rate' default='researching'>
<$reveal state="!!rate" type="match" text="researching">This rating is used when currently investigating but have not yet reached any publishable conclusion.<$reveal state="!!rate" type="match" text="true">This rating indicates that the primary elements of a claim are demonstrably true.<$reveal state="!!rate" type="match" text="partially">This rating indicates that a claim has significant elements of both truth and falsity to it such that it could not fairly be described by any other rating.<$reveal state="!!rate" type="match" text="false">This rating indicates that the primary elements of a claim are demonstrably false.<$reveal state="!!rate" type="match" text="unfounded">This rating applies to a claim that we have investigated but found no demonstrable evidence to support it. Such claims typically originate as hearsay, speculation, or groundless rumor.

text:
(function(){"use strict";exports.rsort=function(source,operator,options){var results=prepare_results(source);options.wiki.sortTiddlers(results,"title",operator.prefix==="!",false,false);if(operator.operand.length>0){var reresults=reorder_results(results,operator.operand);return reresults;}else{return results;}};var prepare_results=function(source){var results=[];source(function(tiddler,title){results.push(title);});return results;};var reorder_results=function(source,operand){const operandArr=operand.split(" ");var results=[];for(let i=0;i<250;i++){for(let j=0;j<source.length;j++){if(i<source[j].length){for(let k=0;k<operandArr.length;k++){if(!results.includes(source[j])&&operandArr[k].length>0){var pos=source[j].toUpperCase().indexOf(operandArr[k].toUpperCase());if(pos==i){results.push(source[j]);break;}}}}}}
return results;};})();

<$button><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title="New $tagg$ organization" $fields$ tags="organization $tagg$" />{{$:/core/images/new-button}} $tagg$ organization
<$list filter="[tag[organization]tag[$tagg$]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!organization-search}sort[title]]"> <$link to=<>><$view field='title'/>
<$list filter={{!!people}}> <$link to=<>><$view field='title'/>
<$list filter={{!!place}}> <$link to=<>><$view field='title'/>
\end <$macrocall $name="template" tagg={{!!tagg}} countlabel={{!!countlabel}} />
title: $:/plugins/cls/mk/organizationtemplate

\define showno(spouse) Person <> has spouse {{!!title}} identified, but found [[$spouse$]] without <> identified as a spouse.
<$vars title={{!!title}}> <$set name="spouse" value=<> > <$button tooltip="Update spouse field for $spouse$" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/link}} Update $spouse$ to reference <> as a spouse

\end \define nospouse(spouse) Person {{!!title}} has spouse <> identified, but [[$spouse$]] tiddler was not found.
<$vars title=<>> <$set name="tags" value="person"> <$set name="spouse" value={{!!title}}> <$button tooltip="Create spouse" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} create spouse <>

\end \define set-tags() $(tags)$ \define set-spouse() [[$(spouse)$]] \define actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags=<<set-tags>> spouse=<<set-spouse>> /> \end \define appendfieldaction() <$action-listops $tiddler=<<title>> $field="spouse" $subfilter=<<set-spouse>>/> \end \define showsearchicon(icon) <span class="searchicon">{{||$:/core/ui/TiddlerIcon}}</span> \end \define showsheeticon(icon) <span class="groupview">{{||$:/core/ui/TiddlerIcon}}</span> \end \define prog(title) <progress class="pedprogress" value=<<getPersonScore """$title$""">> max="100"></progress> \end \define addbrackets(string) <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugin/cls/mk/export" person1="[[$string$]]" /> <$reveal tag="div" class="cellname" type="nomatch" state="!!caption" text=""><$macrocall $name="getName" caption={{!!caption}} /></$reveal><$reveal type="match" state="!!caption" text=""><$view field="title"/></$reveal></$button> \end \define showcause(person) <$list filter="[tag[event]tag[death]contains:people[$person$]]"><$list filter="[list[!!causeofdeath]]"><div style="max-width: 160px"><$view field="title"/></div> </$list></$list> <<displayageInYears>> \end \define showname(caption) <$reveal tag="div" class="cellname" type="nomatch" state="!!caption" text=""><$macrocall $name="getName" caption="$caption$" /></$reveal><$reveal type="match" state="!!caption" text=""><$view field="title"/></$reveal> \end \define showdates(person, caption) <$set name="showfulldate" tiddler="$:/config/cls/collection" field="pedigreedate" emptyValue=""> <$reveal text="" type="match" default=<<showfulldate>>> <$set filter="[[$person$]search:caption[(]]" name=useDate> <$reveal text=<<useDate>> default="" type=match>(<$list filter="[tag[event]tag[birth]contains:people[$person$]]">{{!!date}}</$list> - <$list filter="[tag[event]tag[death]contains:people[$person$]]">{{!!date}}</$list>)</$reveal><$reveal text=<<useDate>> default="" type=nomatch><$macrocall $name="getSubCaption" caption="$caption$" /></$reveal></$set></$reveal><$reveal text="fulldate" type="match" default=<<showfulldate>>> (<$list filter="[tag[event]tag[birth]contains:people[$person$]]">{{!!date}}</$list> - <$list filter="[tag[event]tag[death]contains:people[$person$]]">{{!!date}}</$list>)</$reveal><$reveal text="captiondate" type="match" default=<<showfulldate>>> <$macrocall $name="getSubCaption" caption="$caption$" /></$reveal> </$set> \end \define pedigree(name) <$list filter="[[$name$]]"> <div class="events"> <h3><$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!caption" text=""><$macrocall $name="getName" field="title"/></$reveal></td> <$list filter={{!!father}}> <td rowspan="2" id="Father" class="person line-bottom"><$macrocall $name=showicon icon={{!!icon}}/><$link to=<<currentTiddler>>><$macrocall grandDate line-left-down"> <$macrocall $name=showbirthicon person={{!!title}}/><$macrocall $name="prog" title={{!!title}}/> <$macrocall $name=showdates person={{!!title}} caption={{!!caption}}/><br/><$macrocall $name=showcause person={{!!title}}/></td> </$list></$list> </tr> <tr class="prow"> <$list filter={{!!father}}> <td rowspan="2" class="bio \define showreferencedtiddlers(parententity, entity, entityvalue, view, date, single, plural) <$reveal text="$entity$" default="person" type=match>
<>
<$set name=eventdate value="$date$"><$list filter="$entityvalue$ +[sort[title]]"><$link to=<>><$view field='title'/><$set name="birthdate" filter="[tag[event]tag[birth]contains:people{!!title}get[date]]"><$reveal type="nomatch" default=<> text=""><$reveal type="nomatch" default=<> text=""> (age: <$macrocall $name=getAge birth=<> death=<> />)
<$reveal text="$entity$" default="person" type=nomatch>
<>
<$reveal text="$view$" default="tile" type=match><> <$reveal text="$view$" default="list" type=match><$list filter="$entityvalue$"><$link to=<>><$view field='title'/><$reveal state="!!icon" type="nomatch" text="">
<$transclude mode="block" tiddler={{!!icon}} />
<$reveal state="!!pdf" type="nomatch" text=""> [img width=16px [pdf]]<$reveal state="!!image" type="nomatch" text="">
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!thumbnail" text=""><$transclude mode="block" field="thumbnail"/><$reveal type="match" state="!!thumbnail" text=""><$transclude mode="block" field="image"/>

\end \define showreferencedcontent(parententitylist, entity, entityvalue, view, date, single, plural) <$list filter="[enlist[$parententitylist$]]"> <$macrocall $name=showreferencedtiddlers parententity={{!!title}} entity="$entity$" entityvalue="$entityvalue$" view="$view$" date="$date$" single="$single$" plural="$plural$"/>
<> <$list filter="[tag[$entity$]contains:project{!!title}sort[title]]"> <$link to=<>><$view field='title'/>
<> <$list filter="[tag[$entity$]contains:todo{!!title}sort[title]]"> <$link to=<>><$view field='title'/>
\end

text:
<<showsearchbox todo>>

!!! Urgent tasks

<$list
  filter="[tag[todo]!tag[done]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!todo-search}priority[3]sort[created]]"
  template="$:/plugins/cls/mk/ui/todo/TodoItem/WithFeaturesOpen"
  emptyMessage="No urgent tasks"
/>

!!! Important tasks

<$list
  filter="[tag[todo]!tag[done]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!todo-search}priority[2]sort[created]]"
  template="$:/plugins/cls/mk/ui/todo/TodoItem/WithFeaturesOpen"
  emptyMessage="No important tasks"
/>

!!! Tasks requiring reviewing/testing

<$list
  filter="[tag[todo]!tag[done]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!todo-search}priority[1]sort[created]]"
  template="$:/plugins/cls/mk/ui/todo/TodoItem/WithFeaturesOpen"
  emptyMessage="No tasks requiring review"
/>

!!! Tasks not urgent or important (consider deleting)

<$list
  filter="[tag[todo]!tag[done]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!todo-search}priority[]sort[created]]"
  template="$:/plugins/cls/mk/ui/todo/TodoItem/WithFeaturesOpen"
  emptyMessage="No non-urgent or non-important tasks"
/>

text:
\whitespace trim

\define py-archived-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!has[draft.of]!title[Inbox]tag[done]sort[title]]
\end

\define py-active-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!has[draft.of]!title[Inbox]!tag[done]]
\end

\define py-all-categories()
[all[tiddlers]tag[$:/plugins/nico/projectify/tags/Category]sort[title]]
\end

\define py-has-scheduled-todos-in-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[todo]!tag[done]!has[draft.of]has[due]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-active-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-archived-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!title[Inbox]tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!title[Inbox]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-is-project()
[all[tiddlers]all[current]tag[Project]] [all[current]tag[SubProject]]
\end

\define py-is-not-subproject()
[all[tiddlers]all[current]!tag[SubProject]]
\end

\define py-is-empty-project()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-category()
[all[current]has[category]]
\end

\define py-has-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-open-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-no-open-todo()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]count[]match[0]]
\end

\define py-has-scheduled-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]has[due]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-unscheduled-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]!has[due]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-completed-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-next-open-todo()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-filtered-todos()
[all[tiddlers]subfilter<todoFilter>tag[todo]sort[title]]
\end

\define py-open-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]]
\end

\define py-completed-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[done]!has[draft.of]sort[created]]
\end

\define py-todos-due-today()
[all[tiddlers]!tag[done]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]days:due[0]!nsort[priority]]
\end

\define py-todos-overdue()
[all[tiddlers]!tag[done]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!days:due[-1]sort[due]]
\end

\define py-todos-due-today-or-overdue()
[all[tiddlers]days:due[0]] [all[tiddlers]!days:due[-1]] +[!has[draft.of]!tag[done]tag[todo]sort[due]]
\end

\define py-upcoming-due-dates()
[all[tiddlers]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]has[due]sort[due]eachday[due]] -[!days:due[-1]]
\end

\define py-todos-due-on()
[all[tiddlers]!tag[done]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]sameday:due<day>!nsort[priority]]
\end

\define py-has-overdue-todos()
[all[tiddlers]!tag[done]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!days:due[-1]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-todos-due-today-or-overdue()
[all[tiddlers]days:due[0]] [all[tiddlers]!days:due[-1]] +[!has[draft.of]!tag[done]tag[todo]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-is-todo()
[all[current]tag[todo]]
\end

\define py-is-open()
[all[current]!tag[done]]
\end

\define py-is-completed()
[all[current]tag[done]]
\end

\define py-is-overdue()
[all[current]!tag[done]!has[draft.of]!days:due[-1]]
\end

\define py-is-due-today()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]days:due[0]]
\end

\define py-is-due-yesterday()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]days:due[-1]]
\end

\define py-is-due-tomorrow()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]days:due[1]]
\end

\define py-is-due-later()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]!days:due[1]]
\end

\define py-is-scheduled()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]has[due]]
\end

\define py-is-not-scheduled()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]!has[due]]
\end

\define py-is-not-overdue()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]] -[!days:due[-1]]
\end

\define py-unscheduled-todos-subfilter()
tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]!has[due]!nsort[priority]
\end

\define py-scheduled-todos-subfilter()
tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]has[due]sort[due]
\end

\define py-is-active-subfilter()
!tag[done]
\end

\define py-all-projects-and-subprojects-filter()
[tag[Project]] [tag[SubProject]]
\end

\define todo-list-drop-tags()
todo [all[current]tags[]] -Inbox -[tag[Project]] -[tag[SubProject]] [<__tag__>]
\end

\define project-refile-tags()
todo [all[<actionTiddler>]tags[]] -Inbox -[tag[Project]] -[tag[SubProject]] [<currentTiddler>]
\end

\define py-convert-todo-into-project()
[all[current]tags[]] -Inbox -[tag[Project]] -[tag[SubProject]] -SubProject -Inbox -todo Project
\end

\define py-convert-todo-to-inbox()
[all[current]tags[]] -[tag[Project]] -[tag[SubProject]] -SubProject Inbox todo
\end

text: (function(){"use strict";var Widget=require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js").widget;var RefreshWidget=function(parseTreeNode,options){this.initialise(parseTreeNode,options);};RefreshWidget.prototype=new Widget();RefreshWidget.prototype.render=function(parent,nextSibling){this.parentDomNode=parent;this.computeAttributes();this.execute();this.renderChildren(parent,nextSibling);};RefreshWidget.prototype.execute=function(){this.filter=this.getAttribute("subfilter");this.makeChildWidgets();};RefreshWidget.prototype.refresh=function(changedTiddlers){var changedAttributes=this.computeAttributes(),filteredChanges;if($tw.utils.count(changedAttributes)>0){this.refreshSelf();return true;}else{var changedTiddlerTitles=[];$tw.utils.each(changedTiddlers,function(change,title){changedTiddlerTitles.push(title);});filteredChanges=this.wiki.filterTiddlers(this.filter,null,this.wiki.makeTiddlerIterator(changedTiddlerTitles));if(this.filter&&filteredChanges.length>0){return this.refreshChildren(changedTiddlers);}else{return true;}}};exports.refresh=RefreshWidget;})();

\end

title: $:/plugins/sycom/leaflet/templates/geoTiddler

text:
tileLayers are the //background// of the leaflet map. They will not be available offline and will not display at every zoom level.

!! Available tile layers

edit [[tileLayers.json|$:/plugins/sycom/leaflet/lib/tileLayers.json]] if you want to add / remove tile layers.

| !id | !description | !zoom min/max |
|''osm'' |[[OpenStreetMap|http://openstreetmap.org]] classic tile layer | 1/20 |
|''osmfr'' |[[OpenStreetMap|http://openstreetmap.org]] with //baguette// smell | 1/20 |
|''osmhot'' |[[OSM Humanitarian|http://openstreetmap.org]] | 1/20 |
|''osmde'' |[[OSM German|http://openstreetmap.org]] | 1/20 |
|''osmbw'' |Black and White version of [[OpenStreetMap|http://openstreetmap.org]] tiles by Wikimedia labs | 1/20 |
|''sat'' |Satellite photographic layer provided by Esri | 1/18 |
|''natgeo'' |National Geographic style layer provided by Esri| 1/12 |
|''toner'' |Black and white styled OpenStreetMap data provided by [[Stamen|http://stamen.com]] | 1/20 |
|''water'' |Watercolor styled OpenStreetMap data provided by [[Stamen|http://stamen.com]] | 1/20 |
|''thunder'' |Pale styled OpenStreetMap data provided by [[Thunderforest|http://thunderforest.com]] | 1/20 |
|''dark'' |"Dark Matter" styled  OpenStreetMap data provided by [[CartoDB|https://cartodb.com/basemaps]] | 1/20 |
|''positron'' |"Positron" styled  OpenStreetMap data provided by [[CartoDB|https://cartodb.com/basemaps]] | 1/20 |

Derivative Sources
Sources
<> There are <$count filter="[tag[source]contains:type-of-source[Derivative]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!source-search}sort[title]]"/> sources that are derivative sources.
Derivative records contain information whose informant was not present at the event. This includes copied, abstracted, transcribed and compiled information. In general, the further removed the copies are from the original document, the more likely errors have been introduced.

text:
\define actions(method) <$macrocall $name=ImportGedcom process="$method$" probandid={{!!proband}} direction={{!!direction}} duplicate={{!!duplicate}} searchgivenname={{!!givenname}} searchsurname={{!!surname}} /> \end
ReviewSearchImport
Use the Review feature to provide you a summary of the content and impact of importing a GEDCOM file.

''Things to consider:''
Ensure you have a backup of your existing MK project file before performing any data import.

Consider existing data in your MK project prior to data import. After the data import could there be duplicate entries?

Review and understand the content of the GEDCOM file you want to import.

It is highly recommended you ''not'' import a large number (thousands) of individuals in MK. Adding thousands of individuals typically results in even more events. MK is not designed to replace traditional genealogical software. MK is a research assistant tool. You may experience performance issues with large data sets.

<$button tooltip="Review GEDCOM" aria-label="Review GEDCOM" actions=<> ><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/notifier" text=""/>{{$:/core/images/import-button}}<$text text="Review GEDCOM" /> 		When not importing all individuals the GEDCOM import process requires a valid system ID of an individual that is the main focus of your import. The supplied system ID must be in the format of @In@ where n is the unique identifying number of the Individual in the GEDCOM file.

Eg. @I123@

Use the search feature to find the system ID of an individual, then use the supplied system ID when importing.

''Surname: ''
<$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" field="surname" />
''Given names: ''
<$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" field="givenname" />

<$button tooltip="GEDCOM import" aria-label="Search GEDCOM" actions=<> ><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/notifier" text=""/> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/simple-search/images/search-button}}<$text text="Search GEDCOM" /> 		Use the import feature to import data.

<$select default="stop" tooltip='GEDCOM import option:' field='duplicate'>
<$reveal state="!!duplicate" type="match" text="stop">This will stop the import and block any data from being imported if duplicates are detected.<$reveal state="!!duplicate" type="match" text="">Overwrite any fields in duplicate tiddlers.<$reveal state="!!duplicate" type="match" text="merge">Keep existing fields, but import new fields.<$reveal state="!!duplicate" type="match" text="skip">Do not change any duplicate tiddlers.


<$select tooltip='GEDCOM import option:' field='direction'>
<$reveal state="!!direction" type="match" text="">Import all individuals.<$reveal state="!!direction" type="match" text="ancestors">Import only ancestors of selected individual.<$reveal state="!!direction" type="match" text="descendants">Import only descendants of selected individual.<$reveal state="!!direction" type="match" text="both">Import ancestors and descendants of selected individuals.<$reveal state="!!direction" type="match" text="single">Import only the selected individual.

''System ID of selected individual: ''
<$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" class="tw-edit-texteditor mkTextEdit" field="proband" />
Enter above the system ID of selected individual e.g. @I123@

Analyzing and importing large GEDCOM files may take a some time, enough time that may cause the Browser to prompt you that the page is unresponsive. If this occurs click the //wait// button to continue processing.

text:
Narrative Sources
Sources
<> There are <$count filter="[tag[source]contains:type-of-source[Narrative]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!source-search}] [tag[source]!has:field[type-of-source]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!source-search}] +[sort[title]]"/> sources that are narrative sources.
Narrative sources are items such as a history book or a written family history.

<$select multiple size='10' tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/export" field="$tiddlerfield$"><$list filter='[tag[$tagger$]search:title{$:/config/References/searchstrings!!proband-search}sort[title]]-[has[draft.of]]'>

\end This tiddler will generate HTML code you can copy and save in a separate HTML file. Then define a chart tiddler to show your chart in MK. The chart will be an interactive ancestral sunburst chart of the proband. <$set name="p1" value={{$:/plugins/cls/mk/export!!proband}}> <$list filter=<>> <$macrocall $name="pedigree" name={{!!title}} /> |@@display:block;width:20em;@@ <$edit-text class="persontiddler" tiddler="$:/plugins/cls/mk/export" field="proband"/><$macrocall $name="selector" id="personid1" tagger="person" field="people" tiddlerfield="proband" label="Proband" /> | <$macrocall $name=copybutton proband={{$:/plugins/cls/mk/export!!proband}} /> To create a sunburst chart tiddler, tag a new tiddler with <> and put the text below in the text field. Be sure to change path_to_chart (and html filename) in two places in: ``` Open sunburst on a new tab ``` Then, below the iframe (with at least 1 blank line separating) add some text to help the reader, like: ``` This sunburst illustrates the ancestors of John Smith. Click on any individual to make them the main focus. Click on the background, white space, to return the focus back to John Smith. ``` Then associate the chart tiddler with those people in the chart. In this way, the chart will appear on those tiddlers (under the Chart tab).
title: Sunburst Chart Generator
